name: Super Speed Racer - King of Racing Car
name_original: Super Speed Racer - King of Racing Car
description:
Super Speed Racer across 3 gorgeous (groove) tracks with a press of a finger! Awesome graphics, cool soundtrack and pick-up-and-play controls will keep your entertained for hours!

Beat the opponent to unlock the next track.


HOW TO PLAY:
- Select a way to control the car: Tilt or Button
- Change lane (tracks) to avoid collide with other cars
- Collect fuel before it runs out



How far can you drive?
